[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=777383][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/headlines-hacker.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Award Goals[/color][/b]
Now, members can earn awards just by completing specific goals. Currently, there are only 6 Awards at the moment. More will be added soon. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5986499]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Cancel Active Contracts[/color][/b]
Members can cancel active contracts only if both the parties agree to it. Otherwise, the contract will remain active. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5986528]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]MoTM Automation[/color][/b]
MoTM awards will be granted automatically on the first of each month based on the months most Popular member (Popularity points). Winner will get a PM notification and also a thread will be created by Help Bot. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5985440]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Alerts & Notifications[/color][/b]
Vote for which sort of Notification system do you want. Whether an on-site alert system or push notifications. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5987116]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]New Profile Design[/color][/b]
The new design is currently under expansion for the member's profile page. Go check it out and vote for the change you want to see. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5989026]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Game Tab[/color][/b]
The Game Tab has been completely overhauled. Everything has been organized by Category and, Genere. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5989792]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1651695][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/notablethreads-mix.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Announcements[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5985440][color=#FFFFFF]New MoTM Automation[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
At long last Omniscient has brought back the Member of the month award and this time it's all automated.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5986499][color=#FFFFFF]Award Goals[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
You can now earn awards for just posting or even gaining a 1000 population points. Some of these awards are very easy to get, so make sure you check out the new award goals system.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Informational Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5989026][color=#FFFFFF]New Profile Design Question[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=175033][color=#9999FF][b]Xerotic[/b][/color][/url]
Xerotic has just leaked the new profile design but needs a little help on how to align the profile view. Have your vote and let's hope it's how you like it.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5987116][color=#FFFFFF]Alerts & Notifications Question[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=175033][color=#9999FF][b]Xerotic[/b][/color][/url]
Xerotic wants to know how you would like to receive notifications when you get an alert on site.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5986528][color=#FFFFFF]Contracts Update - Cancel Active Contracts[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=175033][color=#9999FF][b]Xerotic[/b][/color][/url]
An update for the contract has been released, and you can now cancel contracts if both parties agree on this.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Entertaining Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5988375][color=#FFFFFF]Very funny scam e-mail[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3712625][color=#2D7E52][b]Raymond "Red" Reddington[/b][/color][/url]
Raymond has recently shared with us an email he got from the "U.S. Customs and Border Protection," claiming they found a few trucks with a large sum of cargo totalling over 4 million dollars and how one of the trucks was in his name.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5988947][color=#FFFFFF]Amazon Prime Day Coming[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2589435][color=#2D7E52][b]Mr Professor[/b][/color][/url]
Mr Professor is getting ready for Amazon Prime Day, he is also asking if anyone is looking out for anything special.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5988716][color=#FFFFFF][1960s in US] Subliminal messaging caught in national television[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4217914][color=#FFFFFF][b]debian[/b][/color][/url]
debian has shared a very interesting thread about how in the 1960s the US showed the national anthem on national television with subliminal messages, The thread is a bit weird but it's worth a read.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Contests & Giveaways[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5988849][color=#FFFFFF][$$$] $20 GIVEAWAY +REP/Bytes[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3500794][color=#0066FF][b]Hitler[/b][/color][/url]
For a chance to win a free $20 you can send 20 bytes to Hitler and you could have an extra bit of spending money this month.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5983978][color=#FFFFFF]Bytes Giveaway![/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2331053][color=#FFFFFF][b]Mix[/b][/color][/url]
The user known as Mix has started a giveaway with 1000 bytes going to one lucky member who just posts on his thread, and the best part is you can post multiple of times to have a greater chance of winning.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5988606][color=#FFFFFF]$10 BTC Giveaway![/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3109481][color=#FFCC00][b]J FX[/b][/color][/url]
J FX is hosting a small giveaway of 10 Dollars Bitcoin. This is his first ever giveaway and its very easy to enter.
[/list]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2890436][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/trends-pikachu.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Guy Shows How-to Video on Carving A Billiard Ball Into A Skull[/color][/b]
A YouTuber who goes by "Bobby Duke Arts" has uploaded a video where he goes out to buy a set of billiard balls which he plans to turn into art. This YouTuber's passion is turning random things he finds and buys into fine pieces of art. In this video, he will be showing us how he carves a literal billiard ball into a neat little skull. His idea of wanting to turn the ball into a skull came from an Instagram user known as "Skotbiscuit" who has turned many billiard balls into skulls. The result of his skull comes out looking very nice and beautiful. That's what I call some serious talent. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HuDX96t_a_4]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Kumail Nanjiani Sweats Intensely While Eating Spicy Wings | Hot Ones[/color][/b]
Here's another Hot One's episode for everyone, this time Kumail Nanjiani is taking the challenge! For those who don't know who Kumail Nanjiani is, he is well known for his Academy-award nominated film "The Big Sick," and he plays the role of "Dinesh" from the HBO exclusive show "Silicon Valley" which is currently on its sixth season. He will be starring in the upcoming movie "Stuber" alongside Dave Bautista. Unlike most of the other people who took the hot one's challenge, he is the first and only person so far to eat them with a fork and knife. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CDE1jf4_VIY]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Lil Nas X Releases Remix Lyric Video for Old Town Road[/color][/b]
Almost everybody by now should have heard the hit song by Lil Nas X and Billy Ray Cyrus "Old Town Road," and if for some reason you haven't listened to this song, then you must have been living under a rock for the past few months. The new version of the song features Young Thug and Mason Ramsey, and the video is an emoji-style lyric video which was uploaded by the official YouTube channel of Lil Nas X. Check it out if you haven't already. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=loSuMqwQA38]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]YouTuber SteveWillDoIt Eats 30 In-N-Out Burger Patties[/color][/b]
This new up and raising YouTuber known as SteveWillDoIt has uploaded a video in which he orders 30 In-N-Out Burger patties with 30 slices of cheese on each patty, and he devours it like a champ. Watching this video makes me wonder how on earth can a person eat so much and not get full? I give major props to this guy for actually pulling this off; I couldn't pull something like that off, I'd get full after maybe 6 or 7 patties. Seeing this video made me pretty hungry though, especially since In-N-Out Burger is one of my favorite burger joints. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=05Ph2DY90zw]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color]
